Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class SupplyContainer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.SupplyContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptsSupplies, HasStatus
public class SupplyContainer extends Object implements AcceptsSupplies, HasStatus
The SupplyContainer class can store supplies given a policy that decides what supplies are acceptable/removable based on the current state of the container, the type of the object to be added and the source of the object to be added.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    SupplyContainer.AcceptStrategy
    A list of static functions that return common TriPredicate that can be used as accept/remove policy for a SupplyContainer.

      public SupplyContainer​(TriPredicate<SupplyContainer,​WarehouseObjectType,​DepotID> acceptCheck)
      Creates a new empty container that can remove any supply and can accept supplies based on the given policy.
      Parameters:
      acceptCheck - Predicate that decides what supplies can be accepted based on the current state of the container, the type of the object to be added and the source of the object to be added

    • SupplyContainer

      public SupplyContainer​(TriPredicate<SupplyContainer,​WarehouseObjectType,​DepotID> acceptCheck, TriPredicate<SupplyContainer,​WarehouseObjectType,​DepotID> removeCheck)

      Parameters:
      acceptCheck - Predicate that decides what supplies can be accepted based on the current state of the container, the type of the object to be added and the source of the object to be added
      removeCheck - Predicate that decides what supplies can be removed from the container based on the current state of the container, the type of the object to be added and the source of the object to be added

    • getType

      public WarehouseObjectType getType() throws SupplyException
      Returns the type of the container if only one type of supply is present.
      Returns:
      The type of the object present in the container, if no objects are present NO_TYPE is returned
      Throws:
      SupplyException - If more than one object type is present

    • addSupply

      public void addSupply​(WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID from) throws SupplyException
      Adds the supply to the storage. Information about the source of the object needed. Beforehand the corresponding additionAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Specified by:
      addSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      from - Source of the supply
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot accept the supply

    • clearSupplies

      public Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> clearSupplies()
      Removes all of the supplies.
      Specified by:
      clearSupplies in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.

    • addMarble

      public void addMarble​(MarbleColor color, LeadersSpace ls) throws SupplyException, MarbleException
      Tries to add the marble to the container.
      Parameters:
      color - color of the marble to add
      ls - where to look for white marble transformations
      Throws:
      SupplyException - Transformation succeeded but cannot add
      MarbleException - Cannot transform marble
